row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: RESERVATION IP QIP &KISS_HOSTNAME# !: PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,RESERVATION IP QIP &KISS_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="RESERVATION IP QIP &KISS_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: RESERVATION IP QIP &KISS_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,RESERVATION IP QIPS &KISS_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
